VIPSPage.PageTitle: Cho thuê nhiều căn hộ Lucky Palace, Quận 6, diện tích 79-114m2, giá 14-22 triệu/tháng

LayoutNode.Content:
ID tin: 638250 Loại tin: Cho thuê Đã đăng 2 ngày trước Ngày hết hạn: 16/06/2020 Cho thuê Căn hộ chung cư Lucky Palace - Đường Phan Văn Khỏe, Phường 2, Quận 6, TP Hồ Chí Minh .modal-content{ width: 920px; } .modal-content .content-body-street-view{ height: 480px; } .modal-content .map-street-view { margin-left: -2px; float: left; width: 100%; height: 330px; transition: 0.5s; overflow: hidden; } .modal-content .content-body-street-view .pano { height: 330px; width: 0; transition: 0.5s; position: relative; } .modal-content .map-street-view{ position:relative; /*border: 1px solid #e8e8e8;*/ } .modal-content .map-street-view .minimize { position: absolute; top: 46%; right: 0; width: 20px; height: 32px; background: url(https://static.homedy.com/src/images/icon/icon-desktop.png) no-repeat center; background-position: -44px -90px; background-color: #0098da; z-index: 998; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) 0px 1px 4px -1px; cursor: pointer; border-bottom-left-radius: 2px; border-top-left-radius:2px; display: none; } .modal-content .pano .maximize { position: absolute; top: 46%; left: 0; width: 20px; height: 32px; background: url(https://static.homedy.com/src/images/icon/icon-desktop.png) no-repeat center; background-position: -60px -90px; background-color: #0098da; z-index: 998; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) 0px 1px 4px -1px; cursor: pointer; /*display: none;*/ border-bottom-right-radius: 2px; border-top-right-radius: 2px; display: none; } .modal-content .map-street-view .minimize:hover, .modal-content .pano .maximize:hover { background-color: #036f9d !important; } .alert-map { position: absolute; top: 40%; left: 0; right: 0; text-align: center; padding: 8px; z-index: 999; } .alert-map span{ padding: 12px 32px; background: rgba(255, 106, 0, 0.6); color: #fff; font-size: 14px; border-radius: 4px; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) 0px 1px 4px -1px; display: inline-block; } .close-street-view{ position:absolute; top: 8px; right: 16px; font-size: 24px; cursor: pointer; } .modal-content .content-title { font-size: 16px; padding: 16px 0; padding-top: 0; line-height: normal; } .modal-content .content-title p{ font-size: 13px; margin-top: 6px; font-weight: normal; line-height: normal; } .modal-content .content-body-street-view { border-top: 1px solid #ddd; /*padding-top: 12px;*/ position: relative; overflow: hidden; } .btn-street-view { padding: 10px 18px; /*margin-top: 8px;*/ font-size: 15px; font-weight: 500; position: relative; padding-left: 35px; line-height: normal; margin-top: 4px; } .btn-street-view::after { content: " "; position: absolute; top: 8px; left: 8px; display: inline-block; width: 20px; height: 21px; background: url(https://static.homedy.com/src/images/icon/icon-compass.png) no-repeat center; background-size: contain; } .content-body-street-view .hide-list-photo { position: absolute; right: 0; bottom: 140px; display: inline-block; padding: 0px 12px; z-index: 997; background: #fff; line-height: 25px; cursor: pointer; transition: 0.5s; border-top-left-radius: 3px; border-top: 1px solid #e8e8e8; border-left: 1px solid #e8e8e8; } .content-body-street-view .hide-list-photo:before { content: ""; float: left; height: 16px; width: 16px; background: url(https://static.homedy.com/src/images/icon/map/expander-sprite-1x.png) no-repeat center; background-position: 0 0; margin-top: 5px; margin-right: 3px; } .content-body-street-view .hide-list-photo:hover{ background: #e8e8e8; } .content-body-street-view .hide-list-photo.expand{ bottom: 0px; } .content-body-street-view .hide-list-photo.expand:before { background-position: 0 -15px; } .content-body-street-view .list-photo-sphere { position: absolute; height: 128px; /*padding: 4px;*/ padding-top: 12px; padding-bottom: 0; background: #fff; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; z-index: 997; border-top: 1px solid #e8e8e8; transition: 0.5s; /*white-space: nowrap;*/ /*overflow: auto;*/ } .content-body-street-view .list-photo-sphere.owl-carousel { display: block; } .content-body-street-view .list-photo-sphere .item { width: 230px; height: 128px; float: left; margin-right: 4px; background: #fff; cursor: pointer; border: 1px solid #fff; /*display: inline-block;*/ } .content-body-street-view .list-photo-sphere .item:hover { box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) 0px 2px 4px -2px; border: 1px solid rgba(0, 152, 218, 0.60); } .content-body-street-view .list-photo-sphere .guide .thumb{ height: 128px; float: left; width: 244px; background: url(https://static.homedy.com/src/images/icon/map/streetview-demo.png) no-repeat center; background-size: contain; margin-right: 16px; } .content-body-street-view .list-photo-sphere .guide .text { line-height: 25px; margin-left: 16px; font-size: 14px; padding-top: 32px; } .content-body-street-view .list-photo-sphere .guide .text img{ display: inline-block; margin-bottom: -10px; } .content-body-street-view .list-photo-sphere .guide .text span { display: inline-block; width: 8px; height: 8px; margin-left: 3px; margin-right: 3px; margin-bottom: -2px; background: rgba(84,159,184,0.5); border-radius: 6px; border: 2px solid #68aec9; } .content-body-street-view .list-photo-sphere.owl-theme .owl-nav { position: absolute; top: 30%; left: 0; right: 0; max-height: 0; } .content-body-street-view .list-photo-sphere.owl-theme .owl-nav .owl-next { position: absolute; right: -1px; width: 8px; height: 30px; display: inline-block; background: url(https://static.homedy.com/src/images/icon/icon-desktop.png) no-repeat center; background-color: #f5f5f5; background-position: -77px -87px; border-radius: 0; } .content-body-street-view .list-photo-sphere.owl-theme .owl-nav .owl-prev { position: absolute; left: -1px; width: 8px; height: 30px; display: inline-block; background: url(https://static.homedy.com/src/images/icon/icon-desktop.png) no-repeat center; background-color: #f5f5f5; background-position: -29px -87px; border-radius: 0; } @media(max-width: 920px) { .modal-content { width: auto; padding: 8px 0; height: calc(100vh - 18px) !important; } .modal-content .content-body-street-view { height: calc(100vh - 53px); padding-top: 0; } .modal-content .content-title { margin-top: 6px; width: 90%; padding: 8px; } .modal-content .content-title p{ font-size: 12px; } .modal-content .content-body-street-view .map-street-view { /*display: none;*/ position: absolute; /*top: 440px;*/ width: auto !important; left: 0px; right: 0px; height: 100% !important; z-index: 1; } .modal-content .content-body-street-view .pano { width: 100% !important; min-height: 360px !important; height: 100% !important; } .modal-content .map-street-view .minimize, .modal-content .pano .maximize { display: none !important; } .content-body-street-view .list-photo-sphere .guide .thumb{ background-size:cover; width: 128px; margin-right: 8px; } .content-body-street-view .list-photo-sphere .guide .text{ padding-top: 0; } } Street view × Xem hình ảnh xung quanh vị trí bất động sản. var _show_list_photo = true; var _resize_timer = null; var _owl_carousel = null; var _modal_street_view = document.getElementById('modal_street_view'); var _latitude = Number(10.748925000000016); var _longtitude = Number(106.65280139604795); window.addEventListener('load', function () { $('.btn-show-street-view').click(function () { ShowFormContact(); }); $('.close-street-view').click(function (event) { _modal_street_view.style.display = "none"; }); //$('.minimize').click(function () { // Minimize_Map(true); //}); }, true); function ShowFormContact() { _modal_street_view.style.display = "block"; //StreetView_Initialize(); if (map === null) { initMap(); } } function StreetView_Initialize() { var fenway = { lat: _latitude, lng: _longtitude }; console.log(fenway); var map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map_street_view'), { center: fenway, zoom: 14 }); var panorama = new google.maps.StreetViewPanorama( document.getElementById('pano'), { position: fenway, pov: { heading: 34, pitch: 10 } }); map.setStreetView(panorama); } var _full_map = 2; function Minimize_Map(value) { var map_element = $('.map-street-view'); var street_element = $('.pano'); $('.minimize').fadeIn(); $('.maximize').fadeIn(); if (!value) { if (_full_map === 0) { map_element.css({ "width": "30%" }); street_element.css({ "width": "70%" }); //$('.maximize').fadeIn(); _full_map = 1; ResizePano(); return; } if (_full_map === 1) { map_element.css({ "width": "99.9%" }); street_element.css({ "width": '0.1%' }); //$('.maximize').fadeIn(); _full_map = 2; ResizePano(); return; } } else { //$('.maximize').fadeOut(); if (_full_map === 2) { map_element.css({ "width": "30%" }); street_element.css({ "width": "70%" }); _full_map = 1; ResizePano(); return; } if (_full_map === 1) { //$('.maximize').fadeOut(); map_element.css({ "width": 0 }); street_element.css({ "width": "100%" }); _full_map = 0; ResizePano(); return; } } } var map = null; var panorama; var api_key = 'AIzaSyDNI_ZWPqvdS6r6gPVO50I4TlYkfkZdXh8'; var _photo_sphere = []; function initMap() { var berkeley = { lat: _latitude, lng: _longtitude }; var sv = new google.maps.StreetViewService(); // Set up the map. map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map_street_view'), { center: berkeley, zoom: 17, zoomControl: true, streetViewControl: true, //streetViewControl: false }); var marker = new google.maps.Marker({ map: map, position: berkeley, title: 'Vị trí bất động sản', //animation: google.maps.Animation.BOUNCE, //icon: image, }); var nw = new google.maps.LatLng(_latitude, _longtitude); var size = new google.maps.Size(240, 240); map.addListener('projection_changed', function () { $('#map_street_view').append('
'); $('#pano').append('
'); var html = '
' html += '
'; html += '

Hiện tại không có Street view nào trong bán kính 500m xung quanh Bất động sản. Bạn có thể thu nhỏ bản đồ, kéo thả icon thả vào các điểm để xem street view tại điểm đó.

'; $('.content-body-street-view').append(html); html = '

' $('.content-body-street-view').append(html); sv.getPanorama({ location: berkeley, radius: 500 }, processSVData); var bounds = CalcBounds(nw, size, sv); //new google.maps.Rectangle({ // map: map, // bounds: bounds, // strokeColor: 'red', // strokeWidth: 1, // fillOpacity: 0 //}); }); //var nw = new google.maps.LatLng(_latitude, _longtitude); //var bounds = CalcBounds(nw, new google.maps.Size(250, 250), sv); // Set the initial Street View camera to the center of the map // Look for a nearby Street View panorama when the map is clicked. // getPanorama will return the nearest pano when the given // radius is 50 meters or less. //map.addListener('click', function (event) { // sv.getPanorama({ location: event.latLng, radius: 500 }, processSVData); //}); } //function BackgroundInvoke() { // while (true) { // } //} function processSVData(data, status) { if (status === 'OK') { //console.log(data); //$('.list-photo-sphere').html(""); InitImageStreetView(data); if (IsMobile()) { InitPano(data.location.pano); } //panorama.setPosition(data.location.latLng); //panorama.setPano(data.location.pano); //panorama.setPov({ // heading: 34, // pitch: 10 //}); //panorama.setVisible(true); //map.setStreetView(panorama); //marker.addListener('click', function () { // var markerPanoID = data.location.pano; // // Set the Pano to use the passed panoID. // panorama.setPano(markerPanoID); // panorama.setPov({ // heading: 270, // pitch: 0 // }); // panorama.setVisible(true); //}); } else { console.log('Rất tiếc, Gần địa điểm này không có dữ liệu Street view. bán kính tìm 500m'); } } //nw -> là góc trên cùng function MakeBounds(nw, metersEast, metersSouth) { var ne = google.maps.geometry.spherical.computeOffset( nw, metersEast, 90 ); var sw = google.maps.geometry.spherical.computeOffset( nw, metersSouth, 180 ); return new google.maps.LatLngBounds(sw, ne); } // center -> trung tâm hình chứ nhật function CalcBounds(center, size, sv) { var n = google.maps.geometry.spherical.computeOffset(center, size.height / 2, 0), s = google.maps.geometry.spherical.computeOffset(center, size.height / 2, 180), e = google.maps.geometry.spherical.computeOffset(center, size.width / 2, 90), w = google.maps.geometry.spherical.computeOffset(center, size.width / 2, 270); //var marker = new google.maps.Marker({ // map: map, // position: { lat: s.lat(), lng: w.lng() }, // title: 'North East', // //animation: google.maps.Animation.BOUNCE, // //icon: image, //}); // North sv.getPanorama({ location: n, radius: 200 }, function (data, status) { //console.log(data); if (status === "OK") { InitImageStreetView(data); } }); // South sv.getPanorama({ location: s, radius: 200 }, function (data, status) { //console.log(data); if (status === "OK") { InitImageStreetView(data); } }); // East sv.getPanorama({ location: e, radius: 200 }, function (data, status) { //console.log(data); if (status === "OK") { InitImageStreetView(data); } }); // West sv.getPanorama({ location: w, radius: 200 }, function (data, status) { //console.log(data); if (status === "OK") { InitImageStreetView(data); } }); // North East sv.getPanorama({ location: { lat: n.lat(), lng: e.lng() }, radius: 200 }, function (data, status) { //console.log(data); if (status === "OK") { InitImageStreetView(data); } }); // North West sv.getPanorama({ location: { lat: n.lat(), lng: w.lng() }, radius: 200 }, function (data, status) { //console.log(data); if (status === "OK") { InitImageStreetView(data); } }); // South East sv.getPanorama({ location: { lat: s.lat(), lng: e.lng() }, radius: 200 }, function (data, status) { //console.log(data); if (status === "OK") { InitImageStreetView(data); } }); // South West sv.getPanorama({ location: { lat: s.lat(), lng: w.lng() }, radius: 200 }, function (data, status) { //console.log(data); if (status === "OK") { InitImageStreetView(data); } }); return new google.maps.LatLngBounds(new google.maps.LatLng(s.lat(), w.lng()), new google.maps.LatLng(n.lat(), e.lng())); } function InitPano(panoId) { if (panoId !== null && panorama !== null) { if (_full_map === 2) { Minimize_Map(true); } panorama = new google.maps.StreetViewPanorama(document.getElementById('pano')); panorama.setPano(panoId); panorama.setPov({ heading: 34, pitch: 10 }); panorama.setVisible(true); map.setStreetView(panorama); } } function InitImageStreetView(data) { var _already_exist = false; if (_photo_sphere !== null && _photo_sphere.length > 0) { var photo = _photo_sphere.find(function (p) { return p.panoId == data.location.pano }); if (photo !== null && photo !== undefined) { _already_exist = true; } } if (_owl_carousel === null) { $('.list-photo-sphere').html(""); _owl_carousel = $('.list-photo-sphere').owlCarousel({ margin: 20, loop: false, //autoWidth: true, items: 4, dots: false, //autoplay: true, autoplayTimeout: 10000, autoplaySpeed: 2000, nav: true, navText: ["", ""], responsive: { 0: { items: 2, loop: false, margin: 10, nav: false, //autoWidth: true }, 920: { items: 3 }, 1025: { items: 4 } } }); } if (!_already_exist) { var _photUrl = 'https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/streetview?size=230x128&location=' + data.location.latLng.lat() + ', ' + data.location.latLng.lng() + ' &heading=151.78&pitch=-0.76&key=' + api_key; var _html = ''; _photo_sphere.push({ panoId: data.location.pano, location: data.location.latLng, photUrl: _photUrl }); _html += '
' _html += ' ' _html += '
'; $('.list-photo-sphere').owlCarousel('add', _html).owlCarousel('update'); } } //Rất tiếc, Địa điểm này không có dữ liệu Street view. function ResizePano() { if (_full_map !== 2) { if (_resize_timer !== null) { clearTimeout(_resize_timer); } _resize_timer = setTimeout(function () { if (panorama) { google.maps.event.trigger(panorama, 'resize'); } }, 1000); } } //var timer = null; //function Alert_Error(text) { // $('.alert-map').fadeIn(); // var html = '' + text + ''; // $('.alert-map').html(html); // if (timer !== null) { // clearTimeout(timer); // } // timer = setTimeout(function () { // $('.alert-map').fadeOut(); // }, 3000) //} function ShowListPhotoSphere() { var element = $('.list-photo-sphere'); if (!_show_list_photo) { element.css({ bottom: 0 }); _show_list_photo = true; $('.modal-content .content-body-street-view .pano').css({ 'height': '333px' }); $('.modal-content .map-street-view').css({ 'height': '333px' }); $('.hide-list-photo').removeClass('expand'); $('.hide-list-photo').html("Thu gọn"); } else { element.css({ bottom: '-140px' }); _show_list_photo = false; $('.modal-content .content-body-street-view .pano').css({ 'height': '480px' }); $('.modal-content .map-street-view').css({ 'height': '480px' }); $('.hide-list-photo').addClass('expand'); $('.hide-list-photo').html("Xem thêm"); } if (_full_map !== 2) { ResizePano(); } } function IsMobile(){ if (window.innerWidth < 920) { return true; } return false; } .btn-report,.btn-share{font-size:14px;color:#3d4d65;border:1px solid #aaa;border-radius:4px;-webkit-border-radius:4px;-moz-border-radius:4px;padding:9px 20px;background:#fff;cursor:pointer;font-weight:500;outline:none;float:left;margin-right:5px}.btn-share{margin-right:5px;padding:9px 20px;border:1px solid #aaa;color:#3d4d65}.btn-share .fa-mail-forward{width:20px;height:17px;float:left;background:url(https://static.homedy.com/src/images/du-an/chia-se.svg) no-repeat;background-size:17px 17px;position:relative;right:5px}.btn-report:hover{border:1px solid #ed4e51}.btn-report .icon-report{width:20px;height:17px;float:left;background:url(https://static.homedy.com/src/images/du-an/bao-xau.svg) no-repeat;background-size:17px 17px;position:relative;right:5px;top:-2px}.btn-share:hover{border:1px solid #0098da}.modal_report .modal-content{width:500px}.modal_report .close-report,.modal_report .close-share{position:absolute;top:14px;right:10px;font-size:28px;opacity:.54;width:32px;text-align:center;cursor:pointer}.modal_report .close-report:hover,.modal_report .close-share:hover{color:#0098da}.modal_report .content-title{display:inline-block;width:100%;font-size:20px;text-transform:uppercase;color:#0098da;font-weight:500;border-bottom:1px solid #e8e8e8;padding-bottom:10px}.modal_report .input-url{width:calc(100% - 120px);float:left;box-sizing:border-box}.modal_report .btn-copy{float:left;width:120px;text-align:center;border:none;outline:none;cursor:pointer;text-transform:uppercase;padding:11px 0;background:#f5f5f5;border:1px solid #e8e8e8;border-left:0;color:#0098da;font-weight:500;font-size:14px}.modal_report .btn-copy:hover{background:#e8e8e8}.modal_report .content-body .heading-1{font-size:15px;font-weight:500;float:left;width:100%;margin-top:12px}.modal_report .content-body .content-1{display:inline-block;width:100%;margin:10px 0}.modal_report .content-body $('.count-wishlist').html(numberOfWL); localStorage.NumberOfWishList = numberOfWL; } localStorage.removeItem("WishLists"); setTimeout(function () { $(".message-like").hide(); }, 3000) } }); } function UpdateStatusWishList(userName, productID) { var data = { UpdatedBy: userName, EntityId: productID }; if (numberOfWL != null && numberOfWL !== undefined && numberOfWL > 0) { numberOfWL--; $('.count-wishlist').html(numberOfWL); localStorage.NumberOfWishList = numberOfWL; } localStorage.removeItem("WishLists"); LayoutNode.Content: ♪ Căn hộ Lucky Palace được phát triển bởi tập đoàn chủ đầu tư Novaland Group. Tọa lạc tại địa chỉ 50 Phan Văn Khỏe, phường 2, quận 6. Sở hữu vị trí giao thông cực kỳ thuận lợi.
LayoutNode.SRC: ♪ Căn hộ Lucky Palace được phát triển bởi tập đoàn chủ đầu tư Novaland Group. Tọa lạc tại địa chỉ 50 Phan Văn Khỏe, phường 2, quận 6. Sở hữu vị trí giao thông cực kỳ thuận lợi.

LayoutNode.Content: ♪ Căn hộ Lucky Palace nằm ngay khu trung tâm Q6 có một vị trí giao thương bậc nhất Sài Gòn. Thiết kế hiện đại, đẳng cấp với đầy đủ tiện ích với tiêu chuẩn Hong Kong: Tổ hợp ẩm thực, hồ bơi, gym và 3 hầm đậu xe...
